projects.name: Real Estate Marketplace
projects.description: Designed and developed a full-stack real estate application using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) stack. The application allows users to search for properties, view details, and engage in real-time chat functionalities. Configured the backend server using Express.js, Created RESTful API endpoints for handling data operations. Developed React components for the frontend interface, Integrated real-time chat functionality using Socket.io. Implemented database models and operations using Prisma ORM, Handled user authentication securely using JWT.

experiences.description: Master key Salesforce development skills, including Apex coding, Flow Builder, and Apex triggers, through specialized modules and superbadges. Acquire a deep understanding of customer relationship management, data integration, and automation workflows within the Salesforce platform. Enhance problem-solving abilities, technical proficiency, and readiness for Impactful contributions in Salesforce-based projects and initiatives. Strengthen collaboration skills and expand professional network by engaging with industry experts and community members during the internship.
